keyMoments.title: Duval's Mask Removed
keyMoments.description: Luffy kicks off Duval's iron mask during their confrontation, revealing his face for the first time.
keyMoments.significance: The pivotal moment that reveals Duval's true appearance and sets up the explanation for his vendetta.

keyMoments.title: Face Revealed - Sanji's Wanted Poster Twin
keyMoments.description: Duval's face is shown to be identical to the poorly-drawn sketch on Sanji's first wanted poster, shocking the Straw Hat crew.
keyMoments.significance: Major comedic reveal that explains Duval's entire motivation and transforms him from mysterious villain to victim of absurd circumstance.

keyMoments.title: Grudge Against Sanji Explained
keyMoments.description: Duval explains that his resemblance to Sanji's wanted poster has caused him to be hunted by Marines and bounty hunters, ruining his life.
keyMoments.significance: Provides emotional context for Duval's vendetta and shows the real-world consequences of mistaken identity.
keyMoments.quote: Because of you and that cursed wanted poster, my life has been nothing but hell!

abilities.description: Duval wields various harpoon guns including rifle-shaped and rocket launcher variants with poisoned harpoons.
Possesses exceptional physical strength capable of crushing metal harpoons with his bare hands.

relationships.description: Duval harbors intense hatred for Sanji because his face matches Sanji's wanted poster, causing him to be hunted by Marines and bounty hunters.

evolutionMoments.description: Duval reveals his face matches Sanji's wanted poster and explains the suffering this has caused him.

relationships.description: Motobaro is Duval's loyal giant bison mount who rescued him from captivity.

evolutionMoments.description: Motobaro is shown as Duval's trusted steed and companion.

reveals.information: Face revealed to be identical to Sanji's wanted poster drawing
Has been hunted by Marines and bounty hunters due to resemblance to Sanji's wanted poster
Seeks revenge against Sanji for the wanted poster that ruined his life

keyMoments.title: Motobaro's Debut
keyMoments.description: Motobaro appears as Duval's massive bison mount and loyal companion during the confrontation with the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Duval's trusted animal companion who serves as his primary mode of transportation.

abilities.description: Motobaro is a giant bison with exceptional size and strength, capable of carrying Duval and charging into battle.

relationships.description: Motobaro is Duval's loyal mount and companion, having rescued Duval from captivity in the past.

evolutionMoments.description: Motobaro appears as Duval's trusted steed.

reveals.information: First appearance as Duval's giant bison companion
